title: More Than A Few Blessings - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Mature   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Bisexual Protagonist   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Doting Love Interests   Famous Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Hackers   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Jack of All Trades   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Shameless Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters   Showbiz   Smart Couple   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
After being killed accidentally nine years after he graduated from college, Lu Chengyu was reborn to the year he graduated.

In order to avoid the unfortunate fate of his last life, Lu Chengyu started to avoid his classmate who had feelings for him, began to select stocks, and work carefully; everything was in progress.

He just didn’t think that an encounter would bring Yan Mu into his life. Lu Chengyu was no longer lonely.>
